CustomField.description: If there are multiple records under the parent custom metadata section and we want to identify a specific record, this field tells us what value we are looking for when we are trying to filter the records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If there are multiple records under the parent custom metadata section and we want to identify a specific record, this field tells us what value we are looking for when we are trying to filter the records.
CustomField.label: Filter Value
